Package com.oopsipushedtomain.Announcements

package com.oopsipushedtomain.Announcements
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.oopsipushedtomain
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Announcement
    This class represents Announcement objects in the app, with String fields for the announcements title, body image UID, and event UID.
    AnnouncementListActivity
    This activity obtains and displays a list of announcements sent for that even.
    AnnouncementListAdapter
    Custom ArrayAdapter to handle a list of Announcement objects.
    PushNotificationService
    This service handles incoming push notifications for the app.
    SendAnnouncementActivity
    This class defines the page where organizers can create announcements to send to attendees.
